en_US.name: Dyson V15 Detect Cordless Vacuum
en_US.description: Powerful cordless vacuum with laser dust detection and intelligent suction adjustment. Advanced filtration for cleaner air.

de_DE.name: Dyson V15 Detect Akku-Staubsauger
de_DE.description: Kraftvoller Akku-Staubsauger mit Laser-Stauberkennung und intelligenter Saugkraftanpassung. Fortschrittliche Filtration.
